regen.new_specification: The system shall incorporate mechanisms to ensure quick transmission and reception of communications between citizens and police units to perform efficiently.

regen.new_specification: The Citizen Interface module shall incorporate mechanisms, such as real-time response tracking and performance metrics, to ensure quick and efficient communication between citizens and police units.
The system shall provide mechanisms for prioritizing emergency communications to ensure timely responses.

label: The police in turn can use it to respond to citizens with very little turnaround time.
